item.title: Hello world!
item.dc:creator: Carlo
item.content:encoded: Welcome to WordPress. This is your first post. Edit or delete it, then start writing!

wp:comment.wp:comment_content: Hi, this is a comment. To get started with moderating, editing, and deleting comments, please visit the Comments screen in the dashboard. Commenter avatars come from Gravatar.

item.title: Sample Page
item.dc:creator: Carlo
item.content:encoded:
This is an example page. It's different from a blog post because it will stay in one place and will show up in your site navigation (in most themes). Most people start with an About page that introduces them to potential site visitors. It might say something like this:

Hi there! I'm a bike messenger by day, aspiring actor by night, and this is my website. I live in Los Angeles, have a great dog named Jack, and I like piña coladas. (And gettin' caught in the rain.)

...or something like this:

The XYZ Doohickey Company was founded in 1971, and has been providing quality doohickeys to the public ever since. Located in Gotham City, XYZ employs over 2,000 people and does all kinds of awesome things for the Gotham community.

As a new WordPress user, you should go to your dashboard to delete this page and create new pages for your content. Have fun!

item.title: Privacy Policy
item.dc:creator: Carlo
item.content:encoded:
Who we are

Suggested text: Our website address is: http://localhost/prjs/malum.

Comments

Suggested text: When visitors leave comments on the site we collect the data shown in the comments form, and also the visitor’s IP address and browser user agent string to help spam detection.

An anonymized string created from your email address (also called a hash) may be provided to the Gravatar service to see if you are using it. The Gravatar service privacy policy is available here: https://automattic.com/privacy/. After approval of your comment, your profile picture is visible to the public in the context of your comment.

Media

Suggested text: If you upload images to the website, you should avoid uploading images with embedded location data (EXIF GPS) included. Visitors to the website can download and extract any location data from images on the website.

Cookies

Suggested text: If you leave a comment on our site you may opt-in to saving your name, email address and website in cookies. These are for your convenience so that you do not have to fill in your details again when you leave another comment. These cookies will last for one year.

If you visit our login page, we will set a temporary cookie to determine if your browser accepts cookies. This cookie contains no personal data and is discarded when you close your browser.

When you log in, we will also set up several cookies to save your login information and your screen display choices. Login cookies last for two days, and screen options cookies last for a year. If you select "Remember Me", your login will persist for two weeks. If you log out of your account, the login cookies will be removed.

If you edit or publish an article, an additional cookie will be saved in your browser. This cookie includes no personal data and simply indicates the post ID of the article you just edited. It expires after 1 day.

Embedded content from other websites

Suggested text: Articles on this site may include embedded content (e.g. videos, images, articles, etc.). Embedded content from other websites behaves in the exact same way as if the visitor has visited the other website.

These websites may collect data about you, use cookies, embed additional third-party tracking, and monitor your interaction with that embedded content, including tracking your interaction with the embedded content if you have an account and are logged in to that website.

Who we share your data with

Suggested text: If you request a password reset, your IP address will be included in the reset email.

How long we retain your data

Suggested text: If you leave a comment, the comment and its metadata are retained indefinitely. This is so we can recognize and approve any follow-up comments automatically instead of holding them in a moderation queue.

For users that register on our website (if any), we also store the personal information they provide in their user profile. All users can see, edit, or delete their personal information at any time (except they cannot change their username). Website administrators can also see and edit that information.

What rights you have over your data

Suggested text: If you have an account on this site, or have left comments, you can request to receive an exported file of the personal data we hold about you, including any data you have provided to us. You can also request that we erase any personal data we hold about you. This does not include any data we are obliged to keep for administrative, legal, or security purposes.

Where your data is sent

Suggested text: Visitor comments may be checked through an automated spam detection service.

item.title: Black Diamond
item.dc:creator: Carlo
item.content:encoded: We all have gorged on red, crimson, green, and golden apples. How about trying a version of a black bright variety of this super fruit? From the small town of Nyingchi, located in the mountains of Tibet, lately, this graceful and rare apple variety has gained immense popularity. Black diamond apple or black apple, the fruit belongs to the family of Huaniu apples and goes by the scientific name Malus Domestica. Notable for its deep violet almost black hue, it has a distinct, sweet, and robust flavour. Boasting of several health benefits due to the presence of dietary fibers, vitamins, minerals, and antioxidants, and of course a great taste, this rare apple can be a part of your breakfast, pushed into a fruit salad, or fitted into a mid-day snack.

item.title: Malum
item.dc:creator: Carlo
item.content:encoded: Welcome to Malum, where we craft exquisite apple juices that delight your taste buds and nourish your body. Our mission is to provide premium, all-natural apple juices that are bursting with flavor and goodness. At Malum, we believe that the finest apples make the finest juice. That's why we source our apples from the most pristine orchards, carefully selected for their unique flavor profiles and nutritional content. Our apples are handpicked at the peak of ripeness, ensuring that each sip is bursting with flavor and goodness. Our juices are made using a traditional cold-pressing method that preserves the delicate flavors and nutrients of the apples. We don't use any additives, preservatives, or concentrates, so you can be sure that you're getting only the best. Our product line includes a range of delicious flavors, from classic varieties like Golden Delicious and Gala to more unique options like Black Diamond and Arkansas Black. Each juice is carefully crafted to showcase the unique characteristics of the apple variety, so you can experience the full depth and complexity of the fruit. At Malum, we're committed to sustainability and ethical farming practices. We work closely with our farmers to ensure that our apples are grown using environmentally friendly methods that protect the land, the water, and the local ecosystem. In addition to our delicious juices, we also offer a range of products that are perfect for gifting or enjoying at home. Our gift boxes feature our signature juices, along with gourmet treats and locally sourced products that complement the flavors of the season. So why choose Malum? Here are just a few reasons why we stand out from the crowd: * Premium apples: We source our apples from the finest orchards, carefully selected for their unique flavor profiles and nutritional content. * Traditional cold-pressing: Our juices are made using a traditional cold-pressing method that preserves the delicate flavors and nutrients of the apples. * All-natural ingredients: We don't use any additives, preservatives, or concentrates, so you can be sure that you're getting only the best. * Sustainable farming practices: We work closely with our farmers to ensure that our apples are grown using environmentally friendly methods that protect the land, the water, and the local ecosystem. Thank you for considering Malum.

item.title: Sustainability
item.dc:creator: Carlo
item.content:encoded:
At Malum, we believe in supporting local farmers and reducing our environmental impact. That's why we source our apples from local Japanese farmers and use glass bottles for our products.

Our commitment to local farmers

We work closely with local farmers in Japan to source the finest apples for our products. By buying directly from the farmers, we are able to support their livelihoods and help preserve the local agricultural heritage. Our partnership with these farmers also allows us to ensure the quality of our ingredients and maintain a consistent supply chain.

Our commitment to the environment

We are committed to reducing our environmental impact in everything we do. That's why we use glass bottles for our products instead of plastic or other materials. Glass is a sustainable and recyclable material that can be reused multiple times without losing its quality. By using glass bottles, we are able to reduce waste and minimize our carbon footprint.

The benefits of glass bottles

Glass bottles have many benefits for both our customers and the environment. Here are just a few: * Glass is a sustainable and recyclable material that can be reused multiple times without losing its quality. * Glass bottles are non-porous, which means they don't absorb flavors or chemicals like plastic bottles do. This ensures that our products taste great and are safe to consume. * Glass bottles are 100% recyclable and can be reused as many times as possible. * Glass bottles are a more durable and long-lasting packaging solution than plastic or other materials.

Our commitment to sustainability

At Malum, we are committed to sustainability in everything we do. We believe that businesses have a responsibility to protect the environment and support local communities. That's why we source our ingredients from local farmers, use glass bottles for our products, and strive to reduce our carbon footprint in every aspect of our business. We hope you enjoy our products and join us in our commitment to sustainability. By supporting local farmers and using eco-friendly packaging, we can all do our part to protect the environment and build a better future for generations to come.

Thank you for choosing Malum
